$collection.name: Entities
$collection.dynamicChildren:
SELECT 
 	-1 as id, 
 	cs_class.name, 
 	cs_class.id as class_id, 
 	null as object_id, 
 	'N' as node_type, 
 	null as url, 
 	csdc.cidsobjects(cs_class.id::varchar , cs_class.table_name) as dynamic_children, 
 	true as sql_sort,
        true AS derive_permissions_from_class   
     FROM 
 	cs_class,
 	cs_attr
     WHERE cs_class.id = cs_attr.class_id
 	AND cs_attr.field_name ilike 'name'
     ORDER BY cs_class.name;

$collection.name: Taggroups and Tags
$collection.dynamicChildren:
SELECT 
 	-1 as id, 
 	taggroup.name, 
 	cs_class.id as class_id, 
 	null as object_id, 
 	'N' as node_type, 
 	null as url, 
 	csdc.tags(taggroup.id) as dynamic_children,
 	false as sql_sort 
     FROM 
 	taggroup,
        cs_class
     WHERE
         cs_class.name = 'taggroup'
     ORDER BY taggroup.name;
